name: Do You also buy Items?
desc:
Trish helps You in securing items, but You should be causious of using this service too often.
But maybe she also buys items from You, go ask her.

dialog.answer:
You have a good eye for a trader my friend.
I'm interested in most items yes, and my prices are guaranteed to be the best on this ship!
Just come by when You have something of interest.
